node.title: Say hello to Gridsome ðŸŽ‰
node.description: A new static site generator baby is born. It's highly inspired by Gatsby.js (React based) but built on top of Vue.js.

node.title: Markdown test file
node.description: Markdown is intended to be as easy-to-read and easy-to-write as is feasible. Readability, however, is emphasized above all else.

node.title: A post with a cover image
node.description: Markdown is intended to be as easy-to-read and easy-to-write as is feasible. Readability, however, is emphasized above all else. A Markdown-formatted document should be publishable as-is, as plain text, without looking like it's been marked up with tags or formatting instructions.

node.title: Personal Website
node.description: My portfolio website that I built using gridsome (A Jamstack framework for Vue.js)
